name: IconPark 2px(outline & filled) - fonts exportable，可导出字体，适合小程序及iOS App设计
description:
😃 Contains 2400+ icons currently released by Bytedance iconpark

😃 24px size, providing outline and filled styles

😃 Outline icons with 2px line width

😃 All icons are provided as components and can be replaced with one click in figma


🤣 Easter egg: All icons have been converted to stroke, you can upload to iconfont and export font files


P.S:

1. Why use: Icons with a line width of 2px & 24px size are often used in iOS App and WeChat applet, and need to export font files

2. Iconpark icons are very powerful and can cover daily design needs. Thanks again to the hard work of the Bytedance Iconpark team 🙏

3. Looking forward to Iconpark's official launch of the function of exporting font files!


Fixed:

2022/4/25 - Now all outline icons are compatible with iconfont.cn


2022/4/24 - Rename filled icons & Fix some icon style errors


2022/4/14 - Fix some icon style errors


2022/4/12 - All icons can now be exported and the fill color is not exported


～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～


😃 包含bytedance iconpark目前发布的所有图标

😃 大小为 24px，提供outline与filled两种风格

😃 outline图标采用2px线宽

😃 已全部组件化，可在figma中一键替换


🤣 彩蛋：已进行转曲处理，可上传iconfont后导出字体


说明：

1、初衷：微信小程序以及iOS App设计中经常用到2px线宽+24px大小的图标，并且需要能够导出字体文件

2、Iconpark图标很强大，基本可覆盖日常的设计需求，再次感谢Bytedance Iconpark团队大佬们的辛苦付出🙏

3、墙裂期待Iconpark官方推出导出字体文件的功能！！
